name: Xayah
title: the Rebel
lore: Deadly and precise, Xayah is a vastayan revolutionary waging a personal war to save her people. She uses her speed, guile, and razor-sharp feather blades to cut down anyone who stands in her way. Xayah fights alongside her partner and lover, Rakan, to protect their dwindling tribe, and restore their race to her vision of its former glory.
blurb: Deadly and precise, Xayah is a vastayan revolutionary waging a personal war to save her people. She uses her speed, guile, and razor-sharp feather blades to cut down anyone who stands in her way. Xayah fights alongside her partner and lover, Rakan, to...
allytips: Xayah's attacks and abilities leave Feathers on the ground that she can later recall for massive area damage and control.
Xayah can use Featherstorm to dodge almost any ability while also creating a ton of Feathers. Try to utilize the offensive and defensive aspects of this ability.
enemytips: Xayah's Bladecaller will only root targets hit by 3 or more returning Feathers.
Long fights in the same area with Xayah will allow her to drop a lot of Feathers. Try to stay on the move!
Make sure you are ready when you go for the kill. Untargetability from Featherstorm can quickly turn an ambush in Xayah's favor.

riot_spells.name: Double Daggers
riot_spells.description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.
riot_spells.tooltip: Xayah throws two knives dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage each and leaving two Feathers. Targets hit after the first take {{ multihitratio*100 }}% damage.

riot_spells.name: Deadly Plumage
riot_spells.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Xayah creates a storm of blades for {{ e2 }} seconds that grant her {{ e1 }}% attack speed and cause her basic attacks to strike an additional time for {{ e5 }}% damage.

If Deadly Plumage strikes an enemy champion, allies under the effects of Deadly Plumage gain {{ e3 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

If Rakan is nearby he will also gain the effects of Deadly Plumage.

riot_spells.name: Bladecaller
riot_spells.description: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Xayah calls all Feathers back to her, dealing {{ featherdamage }} physical damage to enemies they pass through.

Hitting an enemy with {{ featherthreshold }} Feathers roots them for {{ rootduration }} second(s).

Minions take {{ minionmultiplier*100 }}% damage from Bladecaller.

Critical Strike Chance multiplies feather damage.

riot_spells.name: Featherstorm
riot_spells.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable. She then rains down daggers which deal {{ damage }} physical damage and leave behind a line of Feathers.

Xayah can move while in the air.

riot_passive.name: Clean Cuts
riot_passive.description: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.

i2.name: Clean Cuts
i2.blurb: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.
i2.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an [[Champion ability|ability]], '''Xayah's''' next 3 [[basic attack]]s additionally penetrate through all enemies along a {{tt|900|Estimated}} [[range]] line, dealing 100% damage to her main target and {{pp|3|key=%|showtype=true|30 to 50|1 to 13}} pass-through [[damage]] to other enemies.  At the end of their path, a {{as|Feather|buzzword}} will be left in the ground for 6 seconds.
i2.description2: '''Xayah''' can store up to 5 empowered attacks for 8 seconds, refreshed with further ability use or upon attacking buildings.
i2.description3: {{sbc|Lover's Leap:}} If either '''Xayah''' or {{ci|Rakan}} is {{si|Recall|recalling}}, the other may move nearby and activate their own recall to join them. '''Both''' reach base at the time of which the initiator's recall ends.

q1.name: Double Daggers
q1.blurb: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xayah''' throws two feather-blades in quick succession, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}, and leaving two {{as|Feathers|buzzword}} on the ground.
q1.description2: Targets hit after the first take 50% damage.
q1.leveling2: {{st|Minimum Damage Per Knife|{{ap|22.5|32.5|42.5|52.5|62.5}} {{as|(+ 25% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minimum Total Damage|{{ap|45|65|85|105|125}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''{{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}}'' will block only a single feather blade.
* '''Xayah''' cannot basic attack for a set duration during the cast time of ''Double Daggers''. The lock out duration is reduced by {{ft|{{fd|0.007}} seconds per every {{as|1% '''bonus''' attack speed}}|1 second per every {{as|140% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.
*As the feathers are forming, they will deal damage in a small area around '''Xayah''''s feet before firing.

w1.name: Deadly Plumage
w1.blurb: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xayah''' creates a storm of blades for 4 seconds that grants her {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and cause her basic attacks to strike an additional time for 20% damage.
w1.description2: If ''Deadly Plumage'' strikes an enemy champion, '''Xayah''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
w1.description3: ''If {{ci|Rakan}} is nearby he will also gain the effects of Deadly Plumage, while also gaining the bonus movement speed when '''Xayah''' strikes an enemy champion.''
w1.notes:
* The lesser bolts count as additional sources of single target physical damage, and will apply bonus stacks of {{ii|The Black Cleaver}} and {{ri|Electrocute}}.
* The lesser bolts from {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} will also deal 20% increased damage, which is represented with additional lesser bolts being conjured from the storm. The damage of these W bolts is 20% of the fired Runaan's bolt, ''not'' of the initial auto attack.

e1.name: Bladecaller
e1.blurb: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xayah''' calls all {{as|Feathers|buzzword}} back to her, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies they pass through, increased by {{as|{{pp|11|key=%|key1=%|type=critical chance|0 to 50|0 to 100|formula=0.5%*critical chance}}|critical chance}}. Minions take 50% damage.
e1.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Feather|{{ap|55 to 95}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minion Damage Per Feather|{{ap|55/2 to 95/2}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
e1.description2: Enemies take {{pp|10|type=feathers hit|key=%|100 to 10|0 to 9|displayformula=100%-(10% per previous feather hit). ''This is capped at 10% damage.''}} damage from a {{as|Feather|buzzword}}.
e1.description3: Enemies hit by at least 3 {{as|Feathers|buzzword}} are {{tip|root|rooted}} for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
e1.notes:
* This ability cannot be ranked at level 1.
* The damage dealt by ''Bladecaller'' follows a diminishing returns formula not mentioned in the ability's description, successively reducing extra damage from feathers beyond the first.
** This formula is:
*** For feathers <=10: Damage of one feather{{times}}(n{{minus}}0.1{{times}}(n{{minus}}1){{divided by}}2{{times}}n) where n stands for the number of feathers hit.
*** For feathers >=11: Damage of one feather{{times}}(5.5{{plus}}0.1{{times}}(n{{minus}}10)) where n stands for the number of feathers hit.
** For example, at rank 1 ''Bladecaller'' deals {{pp|10|type=feathers hit|55*(x-0.1*(x-1)/2*x)}}.

r1.name: Featherstorm
r1.blurb: Xayah leaps into the air, becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xayah''' leaps into the air, becoming {{tip|untargetable}} for 1.5 seconds, during which she is still able to move, then rains down daggers which deal {{as|physical damage}} and leave behind a line of 5 {{as|Feathers|buzzword}}.
